title: When is the MSI Internationals?
body: Title. What are all the teams participating in MSI?

replies.body:
May 7-10
So far only NA/EU/LMS teams have been set in stone. TSM/Fnatic/AhQ
IWCI is still going on (Wild Card) which just finished its first day of group stages yesterday.  Nothing definitive yet.
LCK has two more matches (one this Friday then one next Friday) My guess is SKT or GET, but who can know.
LPL have their Finals to do, so either LDG or EDG.
